text: SeatGeek is a proud sponsor of the Marble League
The main event may be done but if you're still craving marble action, welcome to the Showdown
Hey everybody, I'm Greg Woods
The Showdown, kind of like a B-League for the Marble League
Four events, twelve teams
The eight best will advance to the Marble League 2020 Qualifiers
We begin with the same course that hosted the finale of the 2019 Marble League:
The sand course
Randomized starting order, you see some favorites in there as well as some newcomers
Who will it be to take the first event of four in the Showdown?
Off they go
Jawbreakers out in front early on
The newcomers, the Hornets, with Vespa in second place
They almost lose out and are still fighting with Team Primary
Bumblebees! They shoot up into 2nd place
Can they track down the Jawbreakers?
Up ahead, as they work their way back and forth, a decent lead for the Jawbreakers
with Candy the captain of the team
Bumblebees and the Hornets sitting in third and second respectively
An interesting rivalry between the two of them
Who among the winged stingers will make it to the Marble League?
Jawbreakers
holding on out in front
Primary tries to get third place, can't quite get there
Kobalts back behind
Turtle Sliders also in there
That lead has really come down for the Jawbreakers up front
Hornets trying to track them down and getting ever closer
And look, gaps starting to form between second and third now
and look at all of the marbles that are back behind
Speed picking up
Hornets, fending off the Bumblebees
They can see him coming, drafting back and forth, weaving across the course in fact
and the Bumblebees get on through
Where are the Hornets? The Hornets
Look at that pack back behind, it's a freight train!
The Hornets holding on, and now they lose out
Here come the Snowballs!
They're up into fourth place
Trying to get by the Hornets
Right on their tail
Not a place you want to be with a
something that has a stinger on it's tail
I digress
Rojo Rollers up into fourth place
Primary jumps by them
Where did the Rojo Rollers go?
This course can really claim some marbles
Oh! And as I say that, look at this!
Bramble gets stuck on the track and we get another stuck as well
After running in second place for a good chunk of this race
They're caught!
Also hearing Goolime of the Limers being pushed down the course by the wind, you can hear the wind
Oh, and there's Momo!
Team Momo with Momomomo getting stuck and then getting dislodged
So they are able to keep going
Meanwhile up front, the Jawbreakers way out in front
Hornets gonna get second place
Snowballs in third
Oh, good recovery by Momomomo
Fourth
Well, he's fine, not injured or anything, but just frustrated I think
at what could have been after a great run
SeatGeek is a proud sponsor of the Marble League.
They are the best and easiest place to find tickets to your favorite events
Just use promo code "JMR" for $20 off your first SeatGeek purchase
SeatGeek: Life's an event, we have the tickets
And a good finish, just that stumble in the middle cost him what maybe could have been a podium
Getting caught back and forth, that was the Limers I think
Look at that
So we heard Bramble get caught
Momo briefly got caught
I think the Limers might have gotten caught
Either way
Back up front, the Jawbreakers take the first event of the Marble League Showdown
in front of the newcomers the Hornets
and the old favorites, the Snowballs
20 points to them
The next event:
Collision
